mapper.select: select user_id userId, character_no characterNo, user_nickname userNickname, user_email userEmail, user_win userWin, user_lose userLose, user_exp userExp, user_rank userRank from users where user_id=#{userId} and user_password=#{userPassword}
select count(user_id) from users where user_id=#{userId}
select count(user_nickname) from users where user_nickname=#{userNickname}
select user_id userId from users where user_email=#{userEmail}
